title: EM waves - light and sound in vacuum claim

content.question: Which of the following claims about the behavior of light waves and sound waves in a vacuum is true?

choices.label: Light waves can propagate in a vacuum, but sound waves cannot.
Sound waves can propagate in a vacuum, but light waves cannot.
Both light waves and sound waves can propagate in a vacuum.
Neither light waves nor sound waves can propagate in a vacuum.

content.answer: Light waves can propagate in a vacuum, but sound waves cannot.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
